Interface DistanceSimilarityQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>>

D - Distance type
All Superinterfaces:

PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery
public interface DistanceSimilarityQuery<O,D extends Distance<D>>
extends DistanceQuery<O,D>, SimilarityQuery<O,D>

Interface that is a combination of distance and a similarity function. For combined implementations of both.
